snippet: Gary Thor Wedow has taken over the “Messiah” performances at at St. Thomas Church Fifth Avenue, presenting a war horse of a different, brighter color.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance of Handel's Messiah by St Thomas Choir of Men and Boys and period-instrument band Concert Royal at St Thomas Church Fifth Avenue.
lead_paragraph: Gary Thor Wedow has taken over the “Messiah” performances at at St. Thomas Church Fifth Avenue, presenting a war horse of a different, brighter color.

headline.print_headline: A War Horse With Heightened Drama

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: St Thomas Choir of Men and Boys (Manhattan, NY)
